description: This 'User Authentication and Account Management' collection encompasses all endpoints related to managing user authentication and account operations. It covers user registration, login processes, token refresh, user data access with a token, and account recovery options like password reset.

request.description: Allows new users to create an account. Requires first name, last name, email, password, and password confirmation.
Retrieves the authenticated user's profile information. Requires a valid access token.
Authenticates the user and returns authentication tokens (access and refresh tokens).
Logs out the user from the application by invalidating their current access token.
Initiates the password reset process for users who have forgotten their password.
Allows users to reset their password using a token received via email. The request must include the token, the new password, and a confirmation of the new password.
Allows refreshing of the access token using a refresh token.
Toggles the two-factor authentication setting for the user.
